text: Mostafa Adle (مصطفی عدل in Persian, also known as Manṣur-al-Salṭana , 1882 – 12 July 1950) is an Iranian politician, diplomat, juristic, former Ambassador of Iran to Switzerland (1935 — 1939) and president of University of Tehran (1941 —- 1942). He was the representative of Iran in the United Nations Conference on International Organization. During his time as the Minister of Culture of Iran, Adle was also the president of Tehran University, since the university was controlled by the ministry of culture at the time.
